## GenerateResponse.media() method

Returns the first detected media part in the selected candidate's message. Useful for extracting (for example) an image from a generation expected to create one.

**Signature:**

```typescript
media(index?: number): {
        url: string;
        contentType?: string;
    } | null;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

index


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The candidate index from which to extract media, defaults to first candidate.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

{ url: string; contentType?: string; } \| null

The first detected `media` part in the candidate.
